  • Constructor Details

    • Trainer

      public Trainer(Network network, NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> data, int batchSize, boolean weighted, int numBins, int numEpochs, Validator validator)
      General constructor method.
      Parameters:
      network - The neural network to train.
      data - All the training data for the network.
      batchSize - The number of datapoints used in each epoch.
      weighted - If true then we use the WeightedPartitioner, otherwise we use the standard Partitioner.
      numBins - If weighted is true and the network is a regressor, then we need to specify the number of bins for the WeightedPartitioner. Otherwise, this parameter is ignored.
      numEpochs - The number of epochs we are training for.
      validator - The validator used (if any). Pass null for no validation.

    • Trainer

      public Trainer(Network network, NavigableMap<Header,List<String>> data, int batchSize, int numEpochs)
      Defaults constructor. Used for unweighted partitioner and no validation.
      Parameters:
      network - The neural network to train.
      data - All the training data for the network.
      batchSize - The number of datapoints used in each epoch.
      numEpochs - The number of epochs we are training for.

      Overrides:

      Parameters:
